summary:
Quantum entanglement is a cool science concept where particles become connected, even when far apart. When one particle is measured, its partner instantly "knows" what happened, no matter the distance. This is like having a secret code that only you and your friend understand!

Scientists once thought this was impossible, but experiments have proven it's real. Entangled particles can be used for super-fast computers and secret messaging. It's a bit like magic, but it's all based on tiny particles acting in a special way.
title: Quantum entanglement
